attributes.review: When you open the app it starts to make a loud alarm sound and it takes personal information. It also crashes when you try to go back into the app.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: This app is horrible!!! I downloaded it to see why the ratings are so low, and it crashed my phone and it kept kicking me out. 0/10, wouldn’t recommend to anyone
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: This app is ✨utterly disgusting✨why in heck would some make a app...dedicated to an orange*cough* I mean Donald trump of course😷hm🥰Plus you should be glad this app might be removed from the AppStore.I mean you wouldn’t want a orange running the world🥰Thanks for reading!!🌝
attributes.title: One star 💫💫

attributes.review: I was going to see what all the hype was about and when I opened the app I saw the most horrific thing it was, a hot Cheeto man.  It gave me a heart attack, don’t use this app unless you want to see the ugliest thing in the world!😪
attributes.title: Hate you!🥰🙌😇🤩🤠🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.review:
Now that I gave my information I’m getting tons of spam calls and spam emails 😲
Also this app is broken and crashes my phone 😲
attributes.title: He’s selling my information 😲

attributes.review: I have to reset my iCloud cause it keeps taking me back to the app, furthermore I don’t appreciate getting notifications every other minute about your next rally 🤷🏾‍♂️🤡🤷🏾‍♂️🤡
attributes.title: iPhone crash

attributes.review: I was so exited to use the app but then my pet ✨caterpillar✨ decided to step on my phone and then the app wouldn’t work and I kept getting kicked off ;-; I’m so sad, worst app I ever used, does not accept caterpillars. All apps matter :)
attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♀️🧚‍♂️worst app ever🧚‍♂️🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.review: trash app you would think that rich orange would’ve been able to come up with something a little more advanced alas he’s failed me once again
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: I was curious about Trump’s plans for 2020 just in case he did get re-elected but all I got from this app was being kicked out after being it on for more than 2 seconds.
attributes.title: Kicked me out

attributes.review: So....I wanted to download this app to see what its all about....but unfortunately the person this app is made to support is a fascist, ugly, horrendous pig that should be removed from this planet! Please remove this app, it’s useful for nothing
attributes.title: sorry trumpy:(
